INSERT INTO orders (user_id, pay_method, receiver_name, receiver_phone_number, receiver_zipcode, receiver_address, receiver_detail_address, receiver_message, ordered_at, order_status)
VALUES (#{userId}, #{payMethod}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhoneNumber}, #{receiverZipcode}, #{receiverAddress}, #{receiverDetailAddress}, #{receiverMessage}, #{orderedAt}, #{orderStatus})
mapper.select: select o.id AS o_id, o.user_id AS o_userId, o.pay_method AS o_payMethod, o.receiver_name AS o_receiverName, o.receiver_phone_number AS o_receiverPhoneNumber, o.receiver_zipcode AS o_receiverZipcode, o.receiver_address AS o_receiverAddress, o.receiver_detail_address AS o_receiverDetailAddress, o.receiver_message AS o_receiverMessage, o.order_status AS o_orderStatus, o.ordered_at AS o_orderedAt, oli.id AS oli_id, oli.order_id AS oli_orderId, oli.order_count AS oli_orderCount, oli.shop_id AS oli_shopId, oli.item_id AS oli_itemId, oli.name AS oli_name, oli.price AS oli_price, oiog.id AS oiog_id, oiog.order_line_item_id AS oiog_orderLineItemId, oiog.ordering AS oiog_ordering, oiog.name AS oiog_name, oio.id AS oio_id, oio.order_item_option_group_id AS oio_orderItemOptionGroupId, oio.ordering AS oio_ordering, oio.name AS oio_name, oio.price AS oio_price from orders o left join order_line_item oli on o.id = oli.order_id left join order_item_option_group oiog on oli.id = oiog.order_line_item_id left join order_item_option oio on oiog.id = oio.order_item_option_group_id where o.id = #{id};
